page.title: 06GOVERNMENT ADMINISTRATION
page.content: We've been looking at the employers in our area.The council is the main employer with approximately 2 000 employees including carpenters,house builders,plumbers,architects and computer operators.The Town Hall itself was built on one of the highest sites in the town.Across the road there is a helicopter pad which business men use.Many people also work in the 20 schools in our area.The Tertiary College employs office staff and many lecturers and trains youngsters in the many skills needed in Harlow's industry.The police station has 185 employees and also controls 5 other stations in the division. Harlow is now linked to British Telecom's Prestel service.It has 55000 computer terminals in the country which means Harlow's businesses are promoted nationwide.
